meta.educational_goal: To demonstrate how binary search works on a sorted array.

states.label: Idle
evidence: Binary Search Demonstration

states.label: Input Error
evidence: outputElem.textContent = 'Please enter a sorted array.';
outputElem.textContent = 'Please enter the target value.';
outputElem.textContent = 'Array contains invalid numbers. Please enter a valid numeric array.';
outputElem.textContent = 'Array is not sorted ascendingly. Please enter a sorted array.';
outputElem.textContent = 'Target value is not a valid number.';

states.label: Binary Search In Progress
evidence: outputCallback(`Starting binary search for target: ${target}`);

states.label: Target Found
evidence: outputCallback(`\nTarget found at index ${mid}.\nTotal steps: ${steps}`);

states.label: Target Not Found
evidence: outputCallback(`\nTarget not found in array.\nTotal steps: ${steps}`);

events.description: User clicks the Perform Binary Search button
evidence: document.getElementById('searchBtn').addEventListener('click', () => {
if (!arrayInput) { outputElem.textContent = 'Please enter a sorted array.'; return; }
if (!targetInput) { outputElem.textContent = 'Please enter the target value.'; return; }

expected_observables: outputElem.textContent = 'Array contains invalid numbers. Please enter a valid numeric array.';
evidence: if (arr.some(isNaN)) { outputElem.textContent = 'Array contains invalid numbers. Please enter a valid numeric array.'; return; }

expected_observables: outputElem.textContent = 'Array is not sorted ascendingly. Please enter a sorted array.';
evidence: for (let i = 1; i < arr.length; i++) { if (arr[i] < arr[i-1]) { outputElem.textContent = 'Array is not sorted ascendingly. Please enter a sorted array.'; return; } }

expected_observables: outputElem.textContent = 'Target value is not a valid number.';
evidence: if (isNaN(target)) { outputElem.textContent = 'Target value is not a valid number.'; return; }
binarySearch(arr, target, outputCallback);
if (arr[mid] === target) { outputCallback(`\nTarget found at index ${mid}.\nTotal steps: ${steps}`); return mid; }

expected_observables: outputCallback(`\nTarget not found in array.\nTotal steps: ${steps}`);
evidence: outputCallback(`\nTarget not found in array.\nTotal steps: ${steps}`); return -1;
<input type="text" id="arrayInput" placeholder="e.g. 1,3,5,7,9,12,15" aria-describedby="arrayHelp" />

components.text: Enter the target value to search:
evidence: <input type="text" id="targetInput" placeholder="e.g. 7" />
<button id="searchBtn">Perform Binary Search</button>

detected_components.text: Enter the target value to search:
